channel.title: Fire in the Attic presented by GameAttic.com
channel.description: Weekly Podcast presented by John Kane and Josh Crouch of Game Attic.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Just a couple of gamers sharing their off beat gamer stroies, video game news and reports.
channel.itunes:keywords: Video, games, video, game, news, Game, Attic, John, Kane, Josh, Crouch, gameattic.com, xbox360, wii, ps3, gamer, gamer, news, game, news
channel.itunes:author: John Kane and Josh Crouch
channel.itunes:summary: The gamers source for all gaming news from old and new systems, off-beat gamer stories, and little bit of everything . Presented by the Creators of Gameattic.com!

item.title: 11/08/09 Fire In the Attic
item.description: Various stories from around the sphere of gaming. We celebrate the upcoming release of MW2, and the recent release of Dragon Age. We also test our rage agianst the blind, the pirates and button mashers!
item.itunes:author: John Kane and Josh Crouch
item.itunes:subtitle: MW2, Dragon Age and the Blind gamers are discussed.
item.itunes:keywords: Video, games, video, game, news, Game, Attic, John, Kane, Josh, Crouch, gameattic.com, xbox360, wii, ps3, gamer, gamer, news, game, news
item.itunes:summary: Various stories from around the sphere of gaming. We celebrate the upcoming release of MW2, and the recent release of Dragon Age. We also test our rage agianst the blind, the pirates and button mashers!

item.description: Return of the Fire in the Attic podcast presented by gameattic.com. We break down recent updates happening around the gaming world and all the new releases.

item.title: 09/13/09 Fire in the Attic
item.description: Madden talk, wii sales report, guitar hero 5 and rock band discussion. Downloading of games via steam and we round out with some toys r us information.

item.title: 08/02/09 Weekly Podcast from GameAttic.com
item.description: Discussion of Madden 10, the future of the Wii, including their sales reports, Gears of War 2 DLC, Gameattic.com site information, and the Fire!
